title: Bizenghast, Volume 2
description: Not every lost soul is a lost cause.Armed with the first of the four tower guards, Dinah and vincent set out to solve the rest of the Mausoleum's riddles, which prove more difficult as the journey progresses. But is Edaniel a help or a hindrance? Between traveling through Bizenghast's early past to rid the woods of a festering plague-carrier, attempting to cheat the Mausoleum out of its contract, and dealing with the vicious ghosts of bratty children, the pair will have to find their own hidden strengths before reaching their next goal, and the mysterious second tower guard, Edrear.
author: M. Alice LeGrow
